about_the_game:
Brawlerz Arena is a fast paced Arena-Combat game, putting players in charge of insane nitrous-infused vehicles with everything a car needs - weapons & explosives! Experience team combat with deathmatch and soccer game modes in high detailed combat arenas. Play online or play split-screen (why not both?).

Epic Features Include

  • Addictive 8-player online action
  • Up to 4 players can play per screen (split screen) in both offline & online games
  • Old school 2, 3, and 4 player split-screen mode for offline or online play
  • Soccer & deathmatch game modes
  • Bots that work in all game modes
  • No racing, why race when you have guns?
detailed_description:
Brawlerz Arena is a fast paced Arena-Combat game, putting players in charge of insane nitrous-infused vehicles with everything a car needs - weapons & explosives! Experience team combat with deathmatch and soccer game modes in high detailed combat arenas. Play online or play split-screen (why not both?).

Epic Features Include

  • Addictive 8-player online action
  • Up to 4 players can play per screen (split screen) in both offline & online games
  • Old school 2, 3, and 4 player split-screen mode for offline or online play
  • Soccer & deathmatch game modes
  • Bots that work in all game modes
  • No racing, why race when you have guns?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT / ATI Radeon HD 2600 XT or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9000 series / ATI Radeon HD 3000 series or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

name: Brawlerz Arena

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT / ATI Radeon HD 2600 XT or greater
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9000 series / ATI Radeon HD 3000 series or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Cars, guns & multiplayer mayhem! Play with insane vehicles with machine guns, railguns, rocket launchers and flamethrowers & compete in deathmatch, soccer and capture the flag game modes!
